name: Wheretoeat
body:
### Welcome to Where To Eat support.
Find help here for any frequently asked questions or ask a question [here](https://github.com/iam10K/WhereToEat/issues/new).

### FAQs

# How do I use a manual location?
Follow these steps.
1. Go to the settings page.
2. Turn the manual location switch to on (should be mostly red).
3. Enter a manual location in the text box. (format: City, State)

# How do I find a new random restaurant?
Click the Find button on the top toolbar.

# Can I set a distance?
Yes, in the settings page change the slider to a desired maximum distance.

# Where does the restaurant data come from?
Where to Eat uses Yelp API to find and display info about restaurants near the user.

# No restaurants are found around me. What do I do?
Recommended steps to take are:
1. Check that you have location services enabled.
2. If using manual location, verify a location is entered.
3. Click the find button again.
4. Verify you can connect to the internet.
5. Lastly, report a problem [here](https://github.com/iam10K/WhereToEat/issues/new).


### Authors and Contributors
Tyler Encke @iam10k
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
